Name: The Ruby Gold
Ingredients: 20 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: DRY SHAKE (without ice) all ingredients. Add ice, SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
History: Created in 2010 by Rufus at the Hide Bar, London. England.
Garnish: Float raspberry and dust with grated nutmeg
